title: Honor level 3

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Just hit honor level three today! Logged in at approx 2:43 am PST and it just showed up.

replies.body: Huzzaaaaah!!! Welcome to Honor Rank 3, you can now look forward to getting Honor Capsules sometimes as opposed to only key fragments.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ygNwErGd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-29T21:18:25.069+0000)
>
> Huzzaaaaah!!! Welcome to Honor Rank 3, you can now look forward to getting Honor Capsules sometimes as opposed to only key fragments.

Thank you!!! I have already received my first capsule and I already love the rewards it gives.
